name: Vaelari
description: Radiant skyborne elves who descend from starlit peaks. Known for their grace and ability to manipulate light, they shun arrogance for quiet divinity.

name: Mirekin
description: Reptilian folk from the murky deltas of Drekk's Hollow. Masters of tracking, disease-curing herbs, and diving deep into poisonous bogs.

name: Thorneth
description: Feral grovekin who reject bows in favor of claws, thorns, and beast-riding. Nature is not worshipped, but *commanded* through ancient pacts.

name: Gryxen
description: Arcane-born humans who wield raw energy through song and sigil. Descendants of elemental oaths, not elven mingling.

name: Ashkai
description: Ash-skinned seers born in volcanic catacombs. They thrive on flame and shadow, embracing loss and rebirth like rituals.

name: Thalorin
description: Silver-tongued cityfolk descended from empire-forgers. Less warriors, more tacticians, they sculpt nations with laws and secrets.

name: Canari
description: Wolf-headed nomads of the Ember Plains. Agile, loyal, and blessed with keen senses, they run in packs and follow the Moonborn Code.

name: Brakyr
description: Chill-hardened giants with hearts of fire, born under eternal snow. They see battle as duty, not glory, and hold ancient rites sacred.

name: Dravok
description: Stoneblooded hulks with tusks and molten blood. They were shaped in furnaces, bred to be kings of war and forge alike.

name: Sularin
description: Desert-soul warriors with fluid grace and deadly blades. They dance like wind and endure like stone, favoring cunning over brute strength.
